title: Into the Hollow Earth
description: It starts with a simple call into the headmaster's office on a perfect fall day. It turns into a search for your missing parents that takes you and your two best friends on a trip into the hollow Earth. Part thriller, part travelogue, part personal quest, The Golden Path: Volume One weaves a labyrinthine journey as you search for answers to the truth about your past and the clues to your future. Every choice you make could be the difference between your parents' life and death, and your ultimate destiny. Four storylines continue from Volume One to Volume Two. Can you find the ultimate Golden Path?
author: Anson Montgomery
